1.text: And saying, Hear now, ye heads of Jacob, and ye judges of the house of Israel: Is it not for you to know judgment?

2.text: Hating the good and loving the evil; plucking off their skin from off them, and their flesh from off their bones.

3.text: And who ate the flesh of my people, and they stripped off their skin from off them; and they brake their bones in pieces, and separated as for the pot, and as flesh in the midst of the kettle.

4.text: Then shall they cry to Jehovah and he will not answer them, and he will hide his face from them in that time, as their doings were evil.

5.text: Thus said Jehovah for the prophets causing my people to wander, and biting with their teeth, and they called, Peace; and who will not give upon their mouth and they consecrated war against him:

6.text: For this, night to you from a vision, and darkness to you from divining; and the sun went down upon the prophets, and the day was dark upon them.

7.text: And they seeing were ashamed, and they divining were disgraced, and they covered over their lip, all of them; for no answer of God.

8.text: But I was filled with power, with the spirit of Jehovah, and judgment and strength to announce to Jacob his transgression, and to Israel his sin.

9.text: Hear now this, ye heads of the house of Jacob, and judges of the house of Israel abhorring judgment, and they will pervert all uprightness.

10.text: Building Zion with bloods and Jerusalem with iniquity.

11.text: Her heads will judge for a gift, and her priests will teach for hire, and her prophets will divine for silver: and they will lean upon Jehovah, saying, Is not Jehovah in the midst of us? he will not bring evil upon us.

12.text: For this, on account of you Zion shall be ploughed a field, and Jerusalem shall be ruins, and the mountain of the house for the heights of the forest.
